SchtrnParams - class com.topologi.schematron.SchtrnParams.
Store a set of Schematron parameters that can be used when creating the validating XSLT stylesheet.
Each entry has a key that is equal to the name of the parameter that should be passed to the stylesheet (e.g.
SchtrnParams() - Constructor for class com.topologi.schematron.SchtrnParams
Create the SchtrnParams object with an initial Hashtable size of 5.
SchtrnValidator - class com.topologi.schematron.SchtrnValidator.
A simple java implementation of an XSLT based Schematron validator.
SchtrnValidator() - Constructor for class com.topologi.schematron.SchtrnValidator
Create a Schematron validator object.
setBaseXML(boolean) - Method in class com.topologi.schematron.SchtrnValidator
Specify if relative paths should be resolved against the XML instance document or against the Schematron schema.

Sets the engine stylesheet by providing a path to the location of the stylesheet file.
